name: Dem Bones Skull and Crossbones Necklace
description:
Who says a skull and crossbones has to be scary?? This smiling guy is cute and fun to wear!

	1 1/8 inch fabric covered button hangs from a 16 inch silver ball chain. (I have other sizes if 16 inches is too small or too large)

	This fabric can be made into a variety of accessories….barrette clips, bobby pins, adjustable rings, necklaces, bookmarks, magnets, Hip Clip organizers! The list goes on!

name: Heart of Hearts ring and Necklace set
description:
These sweet little hearts will look adorable on your little valentine. So sweet it’ll make your heart skip a beat! What a special Valentine’s Day gift!

	7/8 inch fabric covered button is hangs from a 16 inch silver ball chain. (I have other sizes if 16 inches is too small or too large) Smaller 3/4 inch fabric covered button is secured to a silver plated adjustable ring!

	The last pic shows an adorable set of mini ponies available in another listing, not included in this listing. I just wanted to show off how cute they are and what a great compliment to this set they would be!~

	This fabric can be made into a variety of accessories….barrette clips, bobby pins, adjustable rings, necklaces, bookmarks, magnets, Hip Clip organizers! The list goes on!

name: Night and Day Robert Kaufman Ponytail Holders
description:
Classic Black and White Flowers! Popular robert Kaufman designer fabric.

	Set includes two black ouchless ponytail holders securely attached to 1 1/8” fabric covered buttons. Fabric features beautiful black and white flowers.

	I can also make barrette hair clips, bobbies, headbands, Hip Clip bookmarks, rings, necklaces and magnets! Pattern placement may vary from pictures shown above.
